item.title: Making a new blog with Docusaurus v2
item.guid: Making a new blog with Docusaurus v2
item.description: To make a new blog with the upcoming Docusaurus 2, we need understand how GitHub Pages works, and also pay attention to several caveats.

item.title: Problem with inotifywait, VSCode, and Maven
item.guid: Problem with inotifywait, VSCode, and Maven
item.description: When doing some Java development on VSCode, I wanted to use inotifywait to watch for source file changes and automatically build the project when a source file is changed.
